author: Ted Byrne
content: Gorgeous imagining od circles within the cirxular eye. But from a craft standpoint you forgot to mention how easily you can picture your feet in that 7mm circle. Even aacter years of practice - hand held , I've found my toes sneaking into the frame. Or a tripod's 3rd leg. Seriously though these are startling fine images. And your dynamic capture's masterful. Was there much post processing called for to express these emotions?
